title: samasATi
sahitya:
samasATi lEni sAi nAthA!
mamu brOcuTakidi samayamu kAdA! 

anupallavi

gamaka prada sangIta sammOhana
vimalAtmula hrudaya kamalamunElina 

caraNam

mamakAra ahankAra bhava rOhamulanu
shamanincina nIdu kaTAksha phalamu
kamalAnanA! karuNA nidAnA! 
amala trimUrtula hamsamE velasina

madhyama kAlam

antarangamuna nilacina nIdu padAmbuja mosagu cidAnandamutO
cintanu karaga jEsina vintanu intani vivarincuTanA taramA
